content: this is my new serina scarf and it s free it was originally made in hand dyed yarn from bird street yarns i ve had so much fun in designing it you ll find it s a very simple pattern which is easy to remember and is calming to work on hence it s name serina this pattern is written very simply with u k & u s term s included i would recommend giving your scarf a gentle block once finish to open up the design more after blocking my scarf measured 16 inches by 68 inches this sale is for the pattern only the pattern will be sent to you in an email after the purchase please note as it is a digital download your link to the pattern is only available for 30 days please download it to your device as soon as you receive it if you do forget please just pop me a message and i will re-send the link for you i really hope you enjoy making this design as much as i enjoyed designing it happy hooking suzy xx
